Home › Tools › Google Sheet Tab Download Link

Free Tool

Generate a Download Link for One Google Sheets Tab

Use the tab URL that includes gid, pick a format, and get a direct export link for that tab only.

Google Sheets

Single-Tab Download Link Generator

Paste the tab URL from your Google Sheet, pick a format, and get a direct download link for that tab only.

Before you paste:

  • Open your Google Sheet and click the tab you want to download.
  • Copy the URL while that tab is active (URL must include gid=).
  • Paste it below, choose a format, and generate the link.
✅

Direct download link for this tab:

This link only exports the active tab (via its gid). Anyone who opens it needs view access to the sheet.

How to use this tool

1

Open the tab you want

Click the specific tab inside your Google Sheet. Make sure the URL shows gid= for that tab.

2

Copy the URL

Copy the browser URL while that tab is active, then paste it in the tool above.

3

Pick a format and generate

Choose CSV, TSV, XLSX, ODS, PDF, HTML, or ZIP. The generated link exports only that tab.

Supported formats

You can export a single tab as CSV, TSV, Excel (.xlsx), OpenDocument (.ods), PDF, HTML, or zipped HTML. PDF exports use Google's defaults; adjust in the Sheet if you need layout tweaks.

Notes

  • • Anyone using the generated link still needs view permission to the sheet.
  • • The link uses the tab’s gid, so it always points to that specific tab.
  • • No data leaves your browser; everything is generated client-side.
